name: Hunting Threads
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
You fire up to five silken threads out at creatures you can see within range. They must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or be restrained by the threads until the end of your next turn.

You can spend 1 AP before the spell ends to pull any number of creatures restrained by this spell up to 60 feet closer to you. A restrained creature can make a Strength saving throw to resist the effect. On a success, they are pulled 10 feet instead.

The thread is unbreakable, but does not require any physical strength to maintain, even if creatures are hanging in mid-air.
